name: Bird Bait
description:
Prototype #2 for my Prototype Studio class at the NYU Game Center. The creative prompt/challenge was to make a game about animals using tools. I ended up with this pairing:

Yeah, alligators and crocs are badass and all, but nobody gives the sticks/twigs any credit for all the hard work they did. How did they get to the gator's face in the first place? This game answers that question AND lets you experience what it feels like to be an accessory to murder predatory relationships in nature.

All 3D models from poly.google.com

Islands and foliage by Sebastian Böck (also from poly.google.com)

Fonts are Primetime and LemonMilk.
